languages.text: На экран вашего персонального когитатора поступает отчет: неизвестные корабли взяли на буксир "Межзвездный секстант" — грузовое судно одного из крупнейших торговцев Футфола. Похоже, пираты немного перестарались, и теперь вынуждены волочить корабль в более укромное место, чтобы спокойно его разграбить.

traits.locale_text: На экран персонального когитатора Вольного Торговца поступает отчет: неизвестные корабли взяли на буксир "Межзвездный секстант" — грузовое судно одного из крупнейших торговцев Футфола. Похоже, пираты немного перестарались, и теперь вынуждены волочить корабль в более укромное место, чтобы спокойно его разграбить.

languages.text: A report shows up on your personal cogitator screen. Unknown ships are towing the Interstellar Sextant, a cargo ship belonging to one of Footfall's wealthiest traders. It looks like the pirates have bitten off more than they can chew, and have now been forced to drag the ship to a more secluded place where they can plunder it undisturbed.
languages.original_text: На экран вашего персонального когитатора поступает отчет: неизвестные корабли взяли на буксир "Межзвездный секстант" — грузовое судно одного из крупнейших торговцев Футфола. Похоже, пираты немного перестарались, и теперь вынуждены волочить корабль в более укромное место, чтобы спокойно его разграбить.

traits.locale_text: A report shows up on the screen of the Rogue Trader's personal cogitator. Unknown ships are towing the Interstellar Sextant, a cargo ship belonging to one of Footfall's wealthiest traders. It looks like the pirates have bitten off more than they can chew, and are now forced to drag the ship to a more secluded place where they can plunder it undisturbed.

It looks like the pirates have bitten off more than they can chew, and have now been forced to drag the ship to a more secluded place where they can plunder it undisturbed.

It looks like the pirates have bitten off more than they can chew, and have now been forced to drag the ship to a more secluded place where they can plunder it undisturbed.

A report shows up on your personal cogitator screen. Unknown ships are towing the Interstellar Sextant, a cargo ship belonging to one of Footfall's wealthiest traders. It looks like the pirates have bitten off more than they can chew, and have now been forced to drag the ship to a more secluded place where they can plunder it undisturbed.

languages.text: 你的私人沉思者屏幕上出现了一份报告，报告声称一群身份不明的舰船正在拖拽星际六分仪号。这艘货船属于落脚港最富有的商人。看来，那些海盗实在是有点贪多嚼不烂，他们不得不将这艘货船拖到更加隐蔽的地方，以便不受干扰地尽情掠夺。
languages.original_text: A report shows up on your personal cogitator screen. Unknown ships are towing the Interstellar Sextant, a cargo ship belonging to one of Footfall's wealthiest traders. It looks like the pirates have bitten off more than they can chew, and have now been forced to drag the ship to a more secluded place where they can plunder it undisturbed.

traits.locale_text: 你的私人沉思者屏幕上出现了一份报告，报告声称一群身份不明的舰船正在拖拽星际六分仪号。这艘货船属于落脚港最富有的商人。看来，那些海盗实在是有点贪多嚼不烂，他们不得不将这艘货船拖到更加隐蔽的地方，以便不受干扰地尽情掠夺。

languages.text: Un informe aparece en la pantalla de tu cogitador personal. Unas naves no identificadas están remolcando el Sextante Interestelar, un carguero que pertenece a uno de los mercaderes más ricos de Paso. Parece que los piratas han atrapado una presa que les viene grande y tienen que arrastrar la nave a un lugar aislado para poder saquearla en paz.
languages.original_text: A report shows up on your personal cogitator screen. Unknown ships are towing the Interstellar Sextant, a cargo ship belonging to one of Footfall's wealthiest traders. It looks like the pirates have bitten off more than they can chew, and have now been forced to drag the ship to a more secluded place where they can plunder it undisturbed.

traits.locale_text: Un informe aparece en la pantalla del cogitador personal de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Unas naves no identificadas están remolcando el Sextante Interestelar, un carguero que pertenece a uno de los mercaderes más ricos de Paso. Parece que los piratas han atrapado una presa que les viene grande y tienen que arrastrar la nave a un lugar aislado para poder saquearla en paz.

languages.text: あなたの個人用考算機の画面に、レポートが表示される。正体不明の船がインターステラー・セクスタントを曳航している。フットフォールの中でも裕福な商人が所有する貨物船だ。獲物があまりにも大きすぎたためか、海賊は邪魔されずに略奪できる、より人里離れた場所まで船を引きずることを余儀なくされているようだ。
languages.original_text: A report shows up on your personal cogitator screen. Unknown ships are towing the Interstellar Sextant, a cargo ship belonging to one of Footfall's wealthiest traders. It looks like the pirates have bitten off more than they can chew, and have now been forced to drag the ship to a more secluded place where they can plunder it undisturbed.

traits.locale_text: ローグトレーダーの個人用考算機の画面に、レポートが表示される。正体不明の船がインターステラー・セクスタントを曳航している。フットフォールの中でも裕福な商人が所有する貨物船だ。獲物があまりにも大きすぎたためか、海賊は邪魔されずに略奪できる、より人里離れた場所まで船を引きずることを余儀なくされているようだ。

languages.text: Ein Bericht taucht auf deinem persönlichen Cogitator-Bildschirm auf. Unbekannte Schiffe schleppen die Sternensextant hinter sich her, ein Frachtschiff, das einem der reichsten Händler von ganz Footfall gehört. Die Piraten haben sich offenbar übernommen und sind nun gezwungen, das Schiff an einen abgeschiedeneren Ort zu bringen, um es dort in Ruhe zu plündern.
languages.original_text: A report shows up on your personal cogitator screen. Unknown ships are towing the Interstellar Sextant, a cargo ship belonging to one of Footfall's wealthiest traders. It looks like the pirates have bitten off more than they can chew, and have now been forced to drag the ship to a more secluded place where they can plunder it undisturbed.

Ein Bericht taucht auf dem persönlichen Cogitator-Bildschirm {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auf. Unbekannte Schiffe schleppen die Sternensextant hinter sich her, ein Frachtschiff, das einem der reichsten Händler von ganz Footfall gehört. Die Piraten haben sich offenbar übernehmen und sind nun gezwungen, das Schiff an einen abgeschiedeneren Ort zu bringen, um es dort in Ruhe zu plündern.

Unbekannte Schiffe schleppen die Sternensextant hinter sich her, ein Frachtschiff, das einem der reichsten Händler von ganz Footfall gehört. Die Piraten haben sich offenbar übernommen und sind nun gezwungen, das Schiff an einen abgeschiedeneren Ort zu bringen, um es dort in Ruhe zu plündern.

languages.text: Un rapport s'affiche sur l'écran de votre cogitateur personnel. Des vaisseaux inconnus remorquent le Sextant interstellaire, un transporteur appartenant à l'un des marchands les plus riches de Castel. Il semblerait que les pirates aient eu les yeux plus gros que le ventre et n'aient pas d'autre choix que de remorquer le vaisseau dans un endroit plus sûr où ils pourront le piller sans être dérangés.
languages.original_text: A report shows up on your personal cogitator screen. Unknown ships are towing the Interstellar Sextant, a cargo ship belonging to one of Footfall's wealthiest traders. It looks like the pirates have bitten off more than they can chew, and have now been forced to drag the ship to a more secluded place where they can plunder it undisturbed.

traits.locale_text: Un rapport s'affiche sur l'écran du cogitateur personnel {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Des vaisseaux inconnus remorquent le Sextant interstellaire, un transporteur appartenant à l'un des marchands les plus riches de Castel. Il semblerait que les pirates aient eu les yeux plus gros que le ventre et n'aient pas d'autre choix que de remorquer le vaisseau dans un endroit plus sûr où ils pourront le piller sans être dérangés.

languages.text: Kişisel kavramsayar ekranında bir rapor beliriyor. Tanımlanamayan gemiler, Binliman'ın en zengin tacirlerinden birine ait olan Yıldız Yayı adlı yük gemisini çekiyor. Görünüşe göre korsanlar, boylarından büyük bir lokma ısırmış ve gemiyi rahatsız edilmeden yağmalayabilecekleri, daha tenha bir yere sürüklemek zorunda kalmışlar.
languages.original_text: A report shows up on your personal cogitator screen. Unknown ships are towing the Interstellar Sextant, a cargo ship belonging to one of Footfall's wealthiest traders. It looks like the pirates have bitten off more than they can chew, and have now been forced to drag the ship to a more secluded place where they can plunder it undisturbed.
